name: commandsocket
description: Allows to control VSCode via a WebSocket.

commandsocket.role.description: The role of the extension. If set to 'server', the extension will start a WebSocket server. If set to 'client', the extension will connect to a WebSocket server.

commandsocket.host.description: The host to bind the server to or the host to connect to. Leave blank to bind to all interfaces or connect to 127.0.0.1.

commandsocket.port.description: The port to bind the server to or the port to connect to.

commandsocket.password.description: Password to encrypt communication. Leave blank to disable encryption.

commandsocket.timeoutReconnect.description: Time to wait before reconnecting to the server in milliseconds (client mode only).

commandsocket.timeoutManualUpdate.description: Time to wait between manual update checks in milliseconds.
